channel.title: Can someone explain to me when a village blows up?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Can someone explain to me when a village blows up?"

item.title: Re: Can someone explain to me when a village blows up?
item.content:encoded: When the village leader completes the impossible mission.

item.title: Re: Can someone explain to me when a village blows up?
item.content:encoded: so when will a village blow up?

item.title: Re: Can someone explain to me when a village blows up?
item.content:encoded: That's generally a good idea since that's the only way you can get such a rare item.This is why kages warn people that their village is about to be blown so that they can join for STI.

item.title: Re: Can someone explain to me when a village blows up?
item.content:encoded:
should i go to a village that is soon to be blow up?
here are my stats

S1(Level42 - Jonin)
Genjutsu: Level 14 (+3), Strength:+5, Range: 1-13
Ninjutsu:Level 15 (+3) Strength:+4, Range: 1-13 Free Successes: 1
Taijutsu: 13 (+3) ,Strength:+4, Range: 1-14, Free Successes: 1

item.title: Re: Can someone explain to me when a village blows up?
item.content:encoded:
A village blows up when the Kage completes the The Impossible Mission.

It is good for everyone in it, because they all get the item Survived the Impossible. It is good for the Kage because they get a kaiju named after them, can make another village that will be an immortal realm, get many secret perms, and get many other secret bonuses that not many people know about.

Beating the Impossible mission is the closest you can come to 'beating the game'.

EDIT: Dang, Ninja'd by an anonymous. :P

item.title: Re: Can someone explain to me when a village blows up?
item.content:encoded:
your village leader becomes a kaiju.
everybody in the village gets an item called "survived the impossible" which gives 20 stamina a day, reduces the upkeep of the village they are in by 5% and lets them avoid wasteland disease

at least thats what i've been given to understand from this wiki. :3

item.title: Can someone explain to me when a village blows up?
item.content:encoded: what happens, why is it good to be in the village when it blows up and etc?
